pullRequest.title: DCF API-Side PR
pullRequest.bodyText:
First pull request in Common for DCF, consists of api-side code and some testing/telemetry constants.
Added DeviceCodeFlowCommandCallback to Common
Added DeviceCodeFlowCommand to Common
Added DeviceCodeFlowCommandParameters to Common
Added DEVICE_CODE_FLOW_CALLBACK to PublicApiId in Common for Telemetry
Added config file path to TestConstants in Common

commit.message: Preparing API side of DCF protocol, added some skeleton classes
DCF Testing constant added, enables testing in MSAL for DCF

nodes.bodyText: Do we need this class? Doesn't seem to have anything

nodes.bodyText: I'd probably just spell out the name here for clarity.  If not, casing for acronyms is the same as words.  https://source.android.com/setup/contribute/code-style.  I'd also add some javadoc here which also helps with clarity.  You spell it out below ;-)
